name: Swarmpocalypse
description:
Swarmpocalypse Planet earth has been ravaged by aliens...

But humans finally succeeded in hacking alien bio units! It is time to strike back and take down their mothership.

Swarmpocalypse is a tough platformer with a twist: don't move when the aliens are scanning their ship !

Main music track was especially made for the game (end music from a previous work)

Sounds generated with sfbgames.com/chiptone/

Game was made in 24 hours for gamejolt dreamhackjam.

Can you beat this time? I will update the game if you do !
